de.esoco.storage

Class StoragePredicates.GetAttribute<I,A extends org.obrel.core.Relatable>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.expression.BinaryFunction<I,A,java.lang.Object>, de.esoco.lib.expression.ElementAccess<A>, de.esoco.lib.expression.ElementAccessFunction<A,I,java.lang.Object>, java.util.function.Function<I,java.lang.Object>, org.obrel.core.Relatable
    Enclosing class:
    StoragePredicates

    public static class StoragePredicates.GetAttribute<I,A extends org.obrel.core.Relatable>
extends de.esoco.lib.expression.function.GetElement<I,A,java.lang.Object>
    An element accessor that uses reflection to query the value of a certain field in target objects. The reflective access is done through the method ReflectUtil.getFieldValue(String, Object) which will try to make the field accessible if necessary. If that fails an exception will be thrown by getElementValue(Object, Relatable).

    Attention: if the function's output type (O) is not of type Object the field value will be cast to that type at runtime. If it does not match that type a ClassCastException will be thrown.
